page.title: 14Life Style: A Diwali Party
page.content: Before the holidays our teacher said we were going to have a Diwali party at school.The girls could bring their saris. All the class brought different kinds of food to school. I brought pappadums. On the Friday after our music lesson the girls went and changed into their saris and then went to our classroom. Our teacher had arranged the tables and put the food out.She put on Indian music and we played musical bumps. Then we ate the food,it was delicious and I ate my favourite food called samosas. We lit a candle near the blackboard because Diwali is a festival of light. Hindu's believe that Lakshami,the goddess of wealth and fortune,will bring good luck on this day. I really enjoyed the Diwali party very much.
